awd_titl_txt: A Minority Research & Educ. Info. Service: Design, Develop, Pilot Test & Implement on-line Access for HBCUS & Govt.     Agencies
awd_abstract_narration: This project is designed and developed to implement a                           pilot program for the establishment of an on-line                               research and information system.  The two main                                  objectives are:  1)  To broaden the participation of                            minorities in the Federal Government's research,                                development, and education programs;  and 2)  To                                provide on-line access to information on minority                               institutions' education, research, and service                                  programs; such as, institutional data, extramural                               activity (centers, facilities, equipment and consortia                          arrangements) and (faculty, undergraduate and graduate                          students' capabilities).
org_div_long_name: Div. of Equity for Excellence in STEM
